inventoryprofiles.config.comment.openCon: The key open the in-game config GUI
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.sortInv: The key to sort the inventory
The key to sort the inventory in columns
The key to sort the inventory in rows
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.moveAll: The key to move all the itmes that already existed in the container
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.instant:
Adds breaking delay to the blocks that you can instantly mine. This
option has lower priority than "disableBlockBreakingCooldown".
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.disable: Removes breaking delay for all blocks

Removes use key cooldown so you can have equivalently 1 right click
per tick. Can use along with Tweakeroo "tweakPlacementRestriction".
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.prevent: Closing GUI will no longer drop the item that holding by the cursor
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.disbleS: Receiving damage no longer shakes your screen
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.disable: Allows you to have a clearer view underneath lava
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.addInte:
Adds some interval between clicks while sorting. Amount of interval
can be set by "intervalBetweenClicksMs". Might be useful on some
laggy servers or inventory.fastclick disabled servers.
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.sortCli:
When this is true, find the correct item for the first slot first
instead of finding the correct slot for the first item first. You
may only see the difference if "addIntervalBetweenClicks" is on.
Final result won't be different whether this is true or false.
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.sortCur:
When this is true, using hotkey sorting will sort the slots that
curosr is pointing to. Otherwise it will always sort the container.
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.invento: Show move all buttons on GUI
inventoryprofiles.config.comment.showInv: Display tooltips when cursor hover the buttons on GUI
